docs.text: How to extend EBS volume for EC2 instance Extend an EBS volume Go to EC2 -> EBS Click desired volume Edit its size Done. Extend volume size in EC2 df -h lsblk sudo growpart /dev/xvda 1 sudo xfs_growfs /dev/xvda1
docs.title: How to extend EBS volume for EC2 instance
How to extend EBS volume for EC2 instance

docs.text: Go to EC2 -> EBS Click desired volume Edit its size Done.
docs.title: Extend an EBS volume

docs.text: df -h lsblk sudo growpart /dev/xvda 1 sudo xfs_growfs /dev/xvda1
docs.title: Extend volume size in EC2
